name: starter-nodesample
description: authoring node js libraries in es7 using babel 7

scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production babel -s true src -d dist
scripts.clean: yarn run clean:dist && yarn run clean:reports && yarn run clean:coverage
scripts.pretest: yarn run clean:coverage && yarn run clean:reports
scripts.posttest: cross-env NODE_ENV=test mocha -S -R mochawesome --compilers js:babel-register --reporter-options reportDir=reports --check-leaks
scripts.coverage: cross-env NODE_ENV=test babel-istanbul cover src/*.js _mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec
scripts.coverage:ci: cross-env NODE_ENV=test yarn run coverage && codecov
scripts.premonitor: yarn run clean:dist && yarn run build
